title: Ticket #656: Run cross tests using RHEL4 Condor binaries on all Linux platforms.
description:
Nearly half of the BatLab platforms run RHEL3 Condor binaries. The Condor cross tests do not target any platforms for RHEL4 Condor binaries. Please submit a cross test run using RHEL4 Condor binaries of the appropriate architecture to all BatLab Linux platforms. The results will assist us in determining the platforms we can possibly continue to support when RHEL3 Condor binaries are no longer available.

Thanks!

-Becky
remarks:
2009-Sep-04 10:59:15 by tannenba:
Turns out we are not going to pursue this route.

Instead, for the Batlab we are thinking of making building clipped Condor very portable (it is mostly there already), and doing a native clipped Condor build on all the different platforms. Track progress of this effort in ticket #715.
creator: bgietzel
